item.title: Connect-Zero: Reinforcement Learning from Scratch
item.description: For a long time I’ve wanted to get deeper into reinforcement learning (RL), and the project I finally settled on is teaching a neural network model how to play the classic game Connect 4 (pretty sneaky, sis!). Obviously, the name “Connect-Zero” is a cheeky nod to AlphaGo Zero and AlphaZero by DeepMind. I chose Connect 4 because it’s a simple game everyone knows how to play where we can hope to achieve good results without expensive hardware and high training costs.
